title: Panel, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: satin stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Design of detached floral motifs and rings arranged in rows on ground quilted in a lozenge design. Motifs have three different designs, but each one shows a curving stem with flowers and leaves. Embroidery is in brown, red, pink, yellow and green. The panel is made up of two pieces sewed together horizontally.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panel, 18th century.Medium: silk, linen
Technique: satin stitch embroidery on plain weave. 1947-33-1-a,b.
